    • Constructor Detail

      • UriDeploymentScannerManager

        public UriDeploymentScannerManager(String igniteInstanceName,
                                   URI uri,
                                   File deployDir,
                                   long freq,
                                   FilenameFilter filter,
                                   GridUriDeploymentScannerListener lsnr,
                                   IgniteLogger log,
                                   UriDeploymentScanner scanner)
        Creates new scanner.
        Parameters:
        igniteInstanceName - Ignite instance name.
        uri - URI which scanner should looks after.
        deployDir - Temporary deployment directory.
        freq - Scan frequency.
        filter - Found files filter.
        lsnr - Scanner listener which should be notifier about changes.
        log - Logger.
        scanner - Scanner.
